(Original) Update on 1-3-22: I went back when it wasn't so crowded (you were right; winter break was the reason). The animals were very active and I was able to see more of them this time. The zoo staff gives informational talks about the animals outside their enclosure which is a nice touch. I had a very pleasant experience. I will be back again  12-27-21:It's crowded. Kinda small. Monkeys were far away on their island so couldn't see them too well. The tiger was out so I got to see him walk by a few times. The birds and reptiles were plentiful and colorful so that was fun to see. There's a splash pad and playground for kids to play on so that was cool. It's was an OK zoo.

topComments.author: Scooter Chiick
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) J√° estive em muitos zool√≥gicos, incluindo alguns internacionais. Este zool√≥gico tem a sensa√ß√£o mais natural e arquitetonicamente interessante de qualquer outro zool√≥gico que eu j√° estive!  Nada parecia artificial ou opressor. Cada animal parecia estar √† vontade e bem cuidado. As lontras estavam t√£o felizes e ativas e a pregui√ßa (a favorita) estava completamente √† vontade em sua ‚Äúcama‚Äù tirando sua soneca do meio-dia.  Os pre√ßos dos alimentos estavam a par com qualquer restaurante de servi√ßo r√°pido. O √°lcool e os refrigerantes estavam um pouco altos, mas isso √© esperado em qualquer lugar com estilo de atra√ß√£o.  A acessibilidade do ADA tamb√©m foi excelente, mesmo nas trilhas n√£o pavimentadas, consegui navegar facilmente pela superf√≠cie em uma cadeira de rodas manual sem ajuda.  Um dia espero fazer um ‚Äúencontro‚Äù quando eles n√£o exigirem o uso de m√°scara  (Original) I‚Äôve been to many zoos,including a few internationally.  This zoo has the most natural and architecturally interesting feel from any other zoos I‚Äôve ever been to!  Nothing felt artificial or oppressive.  Every animal seemed to be at ease and well cared for.  The otters were so happy and active and the sloth (a personal favorite) was completely at ease in their ‚Äúbed‚Äù taking their mid day nap.  The food prices were on par with any fast service restaurant. The alcohol and sodas were a bit high, but that‚Äôs expected with any attraction style place.  The ADA accessibility was excellent as well, even on the unpaved trails, I was able to easily navigate the surface on a manual wheelchair without assistance.  One day I hope to do an ‚Äúencounter‚Äù when they don‚Äôt demand wearing a mask

topComments.author: Walter Smelt
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O Palm Beach County Zoo √© uma experi√™ncia agrad√°vel e relaxante com uma variedade de recintos para animais aqu√°ticos e de habitat. Alguns dos habitats permitem intera√ß√µes entre h√≥spedes e moradores, de forma interessante e informativa.  Os animais s√£o bem cuidados e alojados em habitats modelados de acordo com o estilo de vida natural de cada animal.  Perto da entrada principal h√° uma fonte de √°gua divertida, √°rea de estar e recrea√ß√£o com algumas instala√ß√µes nas proximidades. As crian√ßas s√£o bem-vindas para brincar na fonte de √°gua walk-through.  Outras atividades divertidas incluem um belo carrossel, √°reas de recrea√ß√£o e mesas de piquenique. Um caf√© est√° dispon√≠vel, juntamente com outras bebidas (m√°quinas e vendedores) em todo o parque.  Os excelentes florais cultivados nas paisagens naturais s√£o um excelente exemplo de uma pr√≥spera comunidade de plantas, contribuindo para uma experi√™ncia multifacetada.  Eventos e exibi√ß√µes especiais tamb√©m fazem parte da experi√™ncia total do zool√≥gico.  (Original) The Palm Beach County Zoo is a pleasant, relaxing experience featuring a variety of water and habitat animal enclosures. Some of the habitats allow interactions between guests and residents, in an interesting and informative way.  Animals are well cared for and housed in habitats closely modeled after the individual animal's natural lifestyle.  Near the main entrance is a fun water fountain, sitting and play area with some facilities nearby.  Children are welcome to play in the walk-through water fountain.  Other fun activities include a beautiful merry-go-round, play areas and picnic tables.  A cafe is available, along with other refreshments (machines and vendors) throughout the park.  Outstanding floral grown in the natural landscapes is an excellent example of a thriving plant community adding to a multi-faceted experience.  Special events and diplays are also a part of the total zoo experience.

topComments.author: Hobart Chapel

topComments.author: Eddie Skornia
topComments.comment: Absolutely horrible experience!!! We got to the zoo around 12. It rained at 12:30 so we took cover and ate lunch during the storm. 30 minutes later after the storm had stopped, we walked out to start our zoo experience. The walkways were unwalkable, animals were brought inside and out of view, locks were put on all of the walk through areas, food stands close, splash pad closed, ect. There was LITERALLY NOTHING to do. I went up to the front to asked for a refund or tickets for another day. They stated "no refunds." This is absolutely ridiculous seeing nothing was open. I expect to be contacted soon or I will ensure this unfair business practice no longer continues.

Eu recomendaria este lugar para quem visita Palm Beach.  (Original) I and my family with two kids had a wonderful time here at Palm beach zoo seeing lots of animals and birds so close as well as kids got to play in water splash zone and had lunch in the cafe inside which was really good. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Palm beach.

topComments.author: Charles Ondrek
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Zool√≥gico pitoresco agrad√°vel com uma variedade de animais e ampla sombra do sol quente da Fl√≥rida. O zool√≥gico inteiro provavelmente levar√° cerca de duas horas para percorrer, dependendo de qu√£o ocupado ele esteja. Quanto mais pessoas houver, mais tempo eu acrescentaria. N√£o h√° muitas exposi√ß√µes internas, ent√£o planeje ficar do lado de fora durante esse per√≠odo. Pre√ßo de US $ 25 para a admiss√£o, o que eu acho um pouco caro, considerando o tamanho geral. Eles tamb√©m t√™m uma grande fonte de spray agrad√°vel √† direita na entrada principal que as crian√ßas (e adultos dispostos üòÉ) ter√£o uma explos√£o refrescante, ent√£o traga o cal√ß√£o de banho! No geral, √≥timo zool√≥gico - n√£o recebi os 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è por causa do pre√ßo.  (Original) Nice quaint zoo with a descent variety of animals and ample amounts of shade from the hot Florida sun. The whole zoo will probably take you about two+ hours to go through, depending on how busy it is. The more people there are, the more time I would add. There are not many indoor exhibits so plan on being outside for the duration. $25 price tag for admission, which I feel is a bit steep considering the overall size. They also have a nice large spray fountain right at the main entry that the kids (and willing adults üòÉ) will have a blast cooling off in, so bring along the swim trunks!  Overall, great zoo - didn‚Äôt get the 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è because of the price.

topComments.author: Bandit99

Viemos aqui para o anivers√°rio das minhas meninas e era ela quem queria ir aqui. N√≥s definitivamente nos divertimos. Voltaremos no futuro para ver mais animais, porque algumas exposi√ß√µes est√£o fechadas. Eu vi um urso preto pela primeira vez, achei muito legal. N√£o consegui comida, mas talvez da pr√≥xima vez. Est√°vamos planejando comprar uma f√°brica de bolo de queijo a cerca de cinco quil√¥metros de dist√¢ncia. Eu recomendaria. Da pr√≥xima vez que vier aqui ser√° com um grande grupo de pessoas. Espero que eles consigam uma girafa  (Original) This was amazing, our first time here. The last time I went to a zoo was when I lived in Puerto Rico a long time ago when I was a kid. We came here for my girls birthday and she was the one who wanted to go here. We definitely had fun. We will be coming back in the the future to see more animals, because some exhibits we're closed. I got to see a black bear for the first time,I thought that was pretty cool. Did not get any food but maybe next time. We were planning on getting cheese cake factory about three miles away. I would recommend. Next time I come here it will be with a large group of people. I hope they get a giraffe

topComments.author: Leonardo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Temos um passe de um ano para isso (e v√°rias outras atra√ß√µes locais). Meus 4 anos escolhem todo s√°bado/domingo para qual lugar ir e muitas vezes ele escolhe o zool√≥gico.  N√£o t√£o bem conservado quanto o Museu de Ci√™ncias ao lado ou o Lion Country Safari, mas ainda nos divertimos muito a cada vez.  Minha recomenda√ß√£o √© ir cedo (assim que abrem), especificamente durante os meses mais frios. √â quando os animais s√£o mais ativos.  Sua loja de presentes tem alguns animais muito legais e eles tamb√©m vendem uma m√°quina de bolhas que funciona muito bem (meu filho leva para todos os parques ao ar livre que freq√ºentamos).  Antes de pagar para alimentar os p√°ssaros, certifique-se de que os p√°ssaros est√£o comendo (j√° vi tantas pessoas desperdi√ßando dinheiro com isso). Muito cedo no dia pode fazer a diferen√ßa.  O Carrosel n√£o √© gratuito (nem mesmo para os membros... Eu n√£o gosto quando eles niquelar e dime voc√™ gosta disso).  Cuidado com o playground de escalada em madeira. A madeira est√° apodrecendo e alguns dos parafusos est√£o expostos (ver foto). Eu removi dois dos parafusos com minhas pr√≥prias m√£os, mas outros s√£o muito dif√≠ceis de remover. Tem sido assim por meses (talvez anos).  (Original) We have a year pass for it (and several other local attractions). My 4 y/o gets to pick each Saturday/Sunday which place to go and he often chooses the Zoo.  Not as nicely kept as the Science Museum next door or the Lion Country Safari, but we still have a great time each time.  My recommendation is to go early (as soon as they open), specifically during the colder months.  That's when the animals are the most active.  Their gift-shop have some really nice animal stuffs and they also sell a bubble machine that works great (my son takes it to all the outdoor parks that we frequent).  Before paying to feed the birds, make sure the birds are eating (I have seen so many people waste money on that). Very early in the day can make a difference.  The Carrosel is not free (not even for members... I dislike when they nickle and dime you like that).  Careful with the wood climbing playground. The wood is rotting and some of the lag bolts are exposed (see photo). I have removed two of the bolts with my bare hands, but others are too hard to remove. It has been like that for months (maybe years).

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meus filhos e eu nos divertimos! O zool√≥gico √© pequeno, mas √© cheio de divers√£o! Meus filhos adoram o zool√≥gico e o lugar √© super legal! The zoo is small but it's filled with fun! My kids love the zoo and the place is super dope! We walked the park for an hour plus and had a blast! I just wish we caught a show. Maybe next time!
